tifocal Motor Neuropathy
What is the outlook for Multifocal Motor Neuropathy ?,"Improvement in muscle strength usually begins within 3 to 6 weeks after treatment is started. Most patients who receive treatment early experience little, if any, disability. However, there is evidence of slow progression over many years.",NINDS,Multifocal Motor Neuropathy
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Multifocal Motor Neuropathy ?,"The NINDS supports a broad range of research on neuromuscular
